original_text: And the Lord said to Moses, “Thus you shall say to the people of Israel: ‘You have seen for yourselves that I have talked with you from heaven.
korean_text: 여호와께서 모세에게 이르시되 너는 이스라엘 자손에게 이같이 이르라 내가 하늘로부터 너희에게 말하는 것을 너희 스스로 보았으니

sentences.original_text: And the Lord said to Moses,
Thus you shall say to the people of Israel:
that I have talked with you
